column4: i should have installed Warty instead of the stupid preview one
either edit /etc/apt/sources.list manually and uncomment the multiverse line, then update && upgrade, or use Synaptic
i am getting an error whith the repositories...
nope, standard install.  sudo dpkg -i cedega....deb
cedega is not distributed in an apt-gettable repo.
you must download the deb manually and install it via dpkg
are you running cedega on hoary ?
installed but haven't executed in quite some months
but have you ran it under a 2.6 kernel?
yes, the newer versions supposed run fine.  Ask in #cedega if you have questions.
